channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- 9200 Series Mobility Controllers and SD-WAN Gateways, 9000 Series Mobility Controllers and SD-WAN Gateways
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) -- 9200 Series Mobility Controllers and SD-WAN Gateways, 9000 Series Mobility Controllers and SD-WAN Gateways

item.title: CVE-2023-38486|2023-09-06T17:48:38.025Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- 9200%20series%20mobility%20controllers%20and%20sd-wan%20gateways%2C%209000%20series%20mobility%20controllers%20and%20sd-wan%20gateways
item.description: A vulnerability in the secure boot implementation on affected Aruba 9200 and 9000 Series Controllers and Gateways allows an attacker to bypass security controls which would normally prohibit unsigned kernel images from executing. An attacker can use this vulnerability to execute arbitrary runtime operating systems, including unverified and unsigned OS images.

item.title: CVE-2023-38484|2023-09-06T17:47:18.689Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- 9200%20series%20mobility%20controllers%20and%20sd-wan%20gateways%2C%209000%20series%20mobility%20controllers%20and%20sd-wan%20gateways
item.description: Vulnerabilities exist in the BIOS implementation of Aruba 9200 and 9000 Series Controllers and Gateways that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code early in the boot sequence. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to and change underlying sensitive information in the affected controller leading to complete system compromise.

item.title: CVE-2023-38485|2023-09-06T17:47:29.963Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise%20%28hpe%29 -- 9200%20series%20mobility%20controllers%20and%20sd-wan%20gateways%2C%209000%20series%20mobility%20controllers%20and%20sd-wan%20gateways
item.description: Vulnerabilities exist in the BIOS implementation of Aruba 9200 and 9000 Series Controllers and Gateways that could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary code early in the boot sequence. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to and change underlying sensitive information in the affected controller leading to complete system compromise.
